content: will be held for your instep top of your foot if you would like to knit a sock with a contrasting cuff heel and toe change to your contrast color now row 1 *slip 1 k1* row 2 slip 1 p19 stitches should be slipped purl-wise which prevents twisting of the stitch continue working row 1 and 2 a total of 10 times you should have 20 total row the columns of slipped stitches should pop out a bit more than the surrounding knit stitches and you should be able to count 10 of them heel turn row 1 slip 1 k10 ssk k1 turn row 2 slip 1 p3 p2tog p1 turn row 3 slip 1 k4 ssk k1 turn row 4 slip 1 p5 p2tog p1 turn row 5 slip 1 k6 ssk k1 turn row 6 slip 1 p7 p2tog p1 turn row 7 slip 1 k8 ssk k1 turn row 8 slip 1 p9 p2tog p1 turn you should now have 12 stitches on your needle if you would like to knit a sock with a contrasting cuff heel and toe change to your main color now gusset pick up your instep top of the foot does not have to be the same as your leg for example you may have done the option 2 or 3 for the leg but wish to switch to option1 for your instep or you may wish to continue the instep in the same pattern as the leg the choice is yours option 1 easiest option 2 option 3 more difficult knit *k3 p1* work in lace pattern see last page for chart and written directions you should have ended the leg after row 8 so you will start with row 1 knit 12 pick up and knit 11 stitches along the side of the heel flap work the 20 stitches of the instep per your option above pick up and knit 11 stitches along the other side of the heel flap knit 6 and place a marker this is the middle of your heel and it is now your beginning of round you should have a total of 54 stitches on your needles 20 for the instep and 34 for the sole distribute in the following manner for ease of working 3 double pointed needles 4 double pointed needles magic loop 20 instep stitches 10 instep stitches 20 instep stitches 17 one side of gusset and half of 10 instep stitches 34 sole stitches heel half of sole stitches 17 one side of gusset and half of 17 other side of gusset and half of heel half of sole stitches heel half of sole stitches 17 other side of gusset and half of heel half of sole stitches your sole will be all stockinette knit every stitch for comfort while your instep will be either knit ribbing or lace as per your choice shape gusset round 1 knit to 3 stitches before
